metadata.Title: CVE-2020-10378 on Ubuntu 23.04 (lunar) - low
metadata.Description:
In libImaging/PcxDecode.c in Pillow before 7.1.0, an out-of-bounds read canoccur when reading PCX files where state->shuffle is instructed to readbeyond state->buffer.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-10378` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

python3-pil - 7.2.0-1
python3-pil.imagetk - 7.2.0-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: pillow package in lunar, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '7.2.0-1').
